#summary a hodge-podge of ideas

http://pastiche.googlecode.com/files/python-logo.gif

= introduction =

The pastiche framework is an enabler for a broad class of applications where rules of behaviour are modelled asynchronously for a multitude of cooperative entities (known as agents).

Some applications of pastiche in the artistic domain will be demonstrated at [http://pastiche.info pastiche.info].
